## Evaluation {.smaller auto-animate="true"}

### Projects (15% + 20%)

-   Two steps projects for a big research topic, preferably relevant to your graduate study!

-   [Project 1](https://moodle.unbc.ca/mod/resource/view.php?id=99177) - research proposal (Oct.19), [Project 2](https://moodle.unbc.ca/mod/resource/view.php?id=99178) - full analysis report (Dec. 7)

-   You will need a dataset

Don't have any data?

-   Ask your supervisor for things related to your project

-   Ask your fellow students

-   Check open-sourced data

-   Ask Sunny or Lisa with a brief description of your study interest and study design, and we will figure something out

## Evaluation {.smaller auto-animate="true"}

### Discussion paper presentation (10%)

-   Check [rubric](https://moodle.unbc.ca/mod/resource/view.php?id=99181) for more details

-   Give a 5 mins presentation in one of the lab session, with a given topic, given readings

-   3 spots available for each lab session, first come first served

-   Save your spot by filling [this form](https://forms.gle/R8s8wheF82DAoYeW6)!
